inclusion.criterion: Presumed malignant glioma based on clinical and radiologic evaluation
inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: MRI showed a spinal cord conus mass which was biopsied and found to be anaplastic astrocytoma.

inclusion.criterion: Tumor must be accessible for injection and must not be located in the brainstem, midbrain, contained within the ventricular system, or located in an infratentorial location
inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: The tumor is located in the T-L spine.

inclusion.criterion: Patients must be planning to undergo standard radiation therapy
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Patients must be 18 years of age or older
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Performance status must be KPS > or equal to 70
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Patients must have SGOT (AST) < 3x upper limit of normal
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Patients must have serum creatinine < 2mg/dl and calculated creatinine clearance >10ml/min
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Patients must have platelets > 100,000/mm3 and WBC > 3000/mm3
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Patients of reproductive age must agree to use a medically accepted form of birth control while on the study
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Patients must give study specific informed consent prior to enrollment
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Patients must be able to tolerate MRI scan procedure
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Prior or ongoing liver disease including known cirrhosis, hepatitis B or C infection but not to exclude patients with a distant history of resolved hepatitis A infection
exclusion.label: does_not_trigger

exclusion.criterion: Patients on immunosuppressive drugs (with exception of corticosteroid)
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Patients with acute infections (viral, bacterial or fungal infections requiring therapy)
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Pregnant or breast feeding patients. Female patients of childbearing age must have negative serum or urine pregnancy test within 1 week of beginning therapy
exclusion.label: does_not_trigger

exclusion.criterion: Evidence of metastatic disease or other malignancy (except squamous or basal cell skin cancers)
exclusion.label: triggers
exclusion.evidence: Patient has a history of anaplastic astrocytoma, which is a type of malignant glioma.

exclusion.criterion: Prior radiation therapy to the brain or prior treatment for brain tumor (except prior biopsy or subtotal resection)
exclusion.label: triggers
exclusion.evidence: Patient has received field radiation t10-l1 followed by 11 cycles of temozolomide.

exclusion.criterion: Other serious co-morbid illness or compromised organ function
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient's history of anaplastic astrocytoma and prior radiation therapy make them likely ineligible. However, the patient's current condition and treatment plan are unclear.
